channel.title: Prayers
channel.description:
first of all, i dont know if this would be server of client side, so i just posted here, can be moved if in the wrong section.
so when i first downloaded my server it came with normal prayers but piety had been replaced with turmoil. now i want to remove turmoil and add piety. i know how to change the sprites etc etc, but i want to change what the prayer does when activated.
could someone explain how to do this please?
